statements: SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics;
SELECT post_id, likes FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT post_id, comments FROM engagement_metrics WHERE comments < 50;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT post_id, sum(likes) as total_likes FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY shares DESC, comments ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_id, likes, shares, comments FROM engagement_metrics WHERE shares > 50 AND comments < 20 ORDER BY post_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, comments, shares FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes < 50 OR (comments > 10 AND shares < 5) ORDER BY comments DESC LIMIT 8;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 50 AND (comments >= 10 OR shares > 20) ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT 6;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 50 AND shares < 10 ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM posts ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM posts WHERE shares < 50;
SELECT * FROM post_engagement WHERE engagement_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 AND shares < 20;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM posts ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM posts WHERE comments > 50 ORDER BY comments ASC;
SELECT p.post_id, p.likes, p.comments, p.shares, e.engagement_date FROM posts p JOIN post_engagement e ON p.post_id = e.post_id WHERE e.likes > 50;
SELECT * FROM likes;
SELECT post_id, like_timestamp FROM likes WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM shares GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT post_id, MAX(share_timestamp) FROM shares;
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE post_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM likes WHERE user_id = '1' ORDER BY like_timestamp DESC;
SELECT post_id, count(user_id) as likes_count FROM likes GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE post_id = '2' ORDER BY comment_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, count(post_id) as share_count FROM shares GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY share_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, like_timestamp FROM likes WHERE post_id = '3' AND user_id = '4';
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_text, num_likes FROM posts WHERE num_likes > 100 ORDER BY num_likes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_text, post_timestamp FROM posts WHERE post_text LIKE '%technology%' ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM posts GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_posts DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(like_timestamp) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1
SELECT post_text, post_timestamp FROM posts WHERE num_likes > 100
SELECT post_text FROM posts WHERE num_likes > num_shares
SELECT post_id, post_text FROM posts WHERE num_comments < 10 ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM likes INNER JOIN posts ON likes.post_id = posts.post_id
SELECT * FROM post_likes;
SELECT post_id, user_id, like_timestamp FROM post_likes ORDER BY like_timestamp DESC;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(user_id) AS total_likes FROM post_likes GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT post_id, user_id FROM post_comments WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, SUM(likes_count) AS total_likes_count FROM post_metrics;
SELECT * FROM post_likes WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY like_timestamp DESC;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(user_id) AS user_count FROM post_likes GROUP BY post_id HAVING user_count > 5;
SELECT post_id, SUM(likes_count) AS total_likes FROM post_metrics WHERE likes_count > 100 GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT post_id, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_engagement FROM post_metrics WHERE shares_count > 50 GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY avg_engagement DESC;
SELECT post_id, performance_date, total_engagement, performance_rank FROM post_performance WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01' AND total_engagement > 500 ORDER BY performance_rank ASC;
